      Methods in model.components.move with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Trade.validate(Player p, boolean firstMove)
      validate checks whether the trade move is valid or not.
      boolean Play.validate(Player p, boolean firstMove)
      validate checks the current player's moves on legality, the following will be checked: It must be the current player's turn and he must have at least 1 block The player must own the blocks he entered The blocks must be placed in the same direction, x or y Defines Orientation to use in the validation of the row, type/colour check If all checks succeed, the move is valid, the score of the move will be calculated
      abstract boolean Move.validate(Player p, boolean firstMove)
      validate checks the validation of the moves.
      Constructors in model.components.move with parameters of type Player 
      Constructor and Description
      Move(Player p)
      Move constructor sets player to p and game to g.
      Play(Player p, Board b)
      Creates a new play object that will represent the move made by the player on the board b.
      Trade(Player p, Bag b)
      Trade will be an action performed by a player.
